projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: This was the first personal project I took on. After taking intro to web design in my first semester at RPI, I became intrigued by what I could do with the web. With a lot more research (specifically css) on my own, I came up with this first draft!

projects.name: Contact-Me
projects.description: After diving more into these web technologies, I was confident enough to work on a project for a client. This gave me experience in working towards someone else's goals, as well as communicating my needs and what can be done in the scope of a project.
